msg: ServiceTracker did note take the trackAllAspects setting into account in the setInitial method causing the ServiceDependencyImpl to remove rather than swap services in some occasions.

msg: - ensure the org.osgi.service.useradmin package is exported by our
- ensure the correct import dependencies are used, without hard
